channel.title: Fun on Live Kaizen life
channel.description: Recent content in Fun on Live Kaizen life

item.title: My First Stargazing Report
item.description: Well, actually I stargazed before, but I didn’t do that to really observe stars and constellations. This time was my first time stargazing as a beginner in Astronomy (learning Astronomy is part of my new year resolutions). It was Monday Night, January the 6th of 2014. I started to stargaze around EST 9.00 pm until 10.00 pm. It was cold in Syracuse since the temperature was -12 degree of Celsius, and the wind, that made the weather colder, blew with the speed of 50 kph.

item.title: Berjebraw Forefathers Chord
item.description: This song was written by Petra G Michael a.k.a Berjebraw. I got to listen to the song yesterday and decided to write the chord. The first time I heard this sing song. I felt like my soul was shaken. Here is the song and the chord Tuning: Standard EADGBe LEGEND EÂ C#Â AÂ BÂ F#Â G#Â Eb e|----0----0----0----0----0----0----0----| B|----0----0----0----0----0----0----0----| G|----9----6----2----4----4----4----9----| D|----9----6----2----4----4----6----9----| A|----7----4----0----2----4----6----6----| E|------------------------2----0---------| Intro : E EÂ EbÂ E Look at what the forefathers left for us EbÂ E Can you feel the spirit moving accordingly Eb One thing I realize about this day C#Â B Oh, have we learned a thing or two AÂ B From what our forefathers left EÂ C# Have we learned, have we learned F#Â E Have we learned, have we learned from our forefathers EÂ C# Have we changed, have we changed F#Â G#Â A Have we learned, have we learned from the past EÂ F# Yesterday was that you learned A Tomorrow is that for us to dream E And today is that for us to live our life EÂ F# To change for the better, to change for the better A To change for the better, to change for the better E To change for the better <p> EÂ C# have we learned, have we learned F#Â E have we learned, have we learned from our forefathers EÂ C# have we changed, have we changed F#Â G#Â A have we learned, have we learned, have we Learned F#Â G#Â A have we learneeeeeeeed, from our forefathers E a thing or two

item.title: Pie a Professor
item.description: Today, I saw a strange event in my school. Staffs in iSchool Syracuse University were raising money to be donated for United Way. What they did was providing a booth were people can throw pie to iSchoolâ€™s professors face. The price is $5 for student and $10 for faculty, but if you only have $3, they’ll take it anyway. I was also offered to throw pie on professor face, but I refused it is not because I didnâ€™t have money, but I think that is not appropriate.

item.title: Mountain Biking in Syracuse
item.description: Today I went for Mountain Biking trip which is organized by SUOC. I’ve done mountain biking when I was in Indonesia almost every weekend. At first I was wondering where can I have good trails for mountain biking in Syracuse. The area is located near Syracuse University south campus. To give you better sense of direction, look at the map below. I don’t have a decent bike for mountain biking and never go for mountain biking with complete equipment but this time was different.

item.title: Canyoneering in Bear Swamp Creek
item.description: I just got home from my first canyoneering trip in my life. Thanks for Syracuse University Outing Club (SUOC) leaders who took me to this trip, here is the story. At first, we set off from SUOC Equipment room (E-room) at 10 am. There were seven people on this trip. Two leaders (Nate and Maggie) and five members (Nick, Megan, John, Sean and me). We went to Bear Swamp Creek in Cayuga County, New York.

item.title: My First US's Family Home Visit
item.description: Yesterday, (4th of August 2013) we went on home visit. We were lucky to have Sue as our host family. Sue’s house is quite far from St. John’s University since it is located in Ringwood, New Jersey. We took a bus from New York Port Authority Bus Terminal (PABT) to Ringwood. I really enjoy our trip since along the road I saw beautiful trees. Unfortunately, I don’t know what kind of trees was it.

item.title: Bakso Moro Seneng Pak Slamet Trenggalek
item.description: Jika anda pecinta kuliner dan kebetulan sedang singgah di kota keripik Trenggalek pastikan anda menyempatkan diri mampir dan mencicipi Bakso Moro Seneng Pak Slamet. Hiruk Pikuk pembeli sudah mulai ramai saat saya datang ke lokasi sekitar jam 10 pagi. Warung bakso yang terletak di Jalan Doktor Setiabudi dekat RSUD Doktor Soedomo Trenggalek ini memang selalu ramai pembeli. Usut punya usut ternyata yang menarik banyaknya pembeli ke warung tersebut adalah ke khas-an yang dimiliki oleh warung bakso tersebut yakni gorengan dan sambal baksonya.

item.title: Circle Square War
item.description: Circle Square War adalah sebuah project pada matakuliah Game Development yang saya ikuti semasa saya kuliah di Teknik Informatika ITS. Game ini merupakan pengembangan dari script yang ditulis oleh Philip Radvan mengenai projectile weapons. Berikut adalah game Circle Square War, dimana game ini adalah modifikasi dari script yang ditulis oleh Philip Radvan tersebut. Selamat bermain dan jadilah salah satu high scorer game ini. ðŸ˜€
